skins.selfIntroduction: I am Penelope of the Royal Navy, Arethusa-class light cruiser. I participated in a transport mission with Aurora and her companions in the K Fleet. There were difficult times, but I managed to pull through. If only I had noticed her back then...
skins.acquisition: Arethusa-class light cruiser... Penelope, is my name. From now on, I will be your subordinate. I hope that you... can at least remember my name.
skins.login: Commander, are you going on a sortie? I shall stay here and await your return.
skins.details: Hmm... You're staring at me so much... Did you happen to want these gloves?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Paperwork, paperwork... Where did I put it again? On that shelf? I can't seem to remember...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Pepperpot? ...Why yes, I do think that food generally tastes better with a healthy pinch of pepper.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I want to get along with U-410. ...Mm, with you here, Commander, I'm sure it will be fine.
skins.secretaryTouch: ...Hm? Is something amiss? I do believe I've been doing everything to your specifications...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hm...? Commander, what are you doing?
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Nnh... Are you treating me like a child?

skins.shipDescription: Aurora chose this outfit for me because... the Spring Festival represents a time of celebration in the Dragon Empery, and red is the color that best symbolizes that. What do you think? Does this outfit... make you feel more festive?
skins.acquisition: Aurora chose this outfit for me because... the Spring Festival represents a time of celebration in the Dragon Empery, and red is the color that best symbolizes that. What do you think? Does this outfit... make you feel more festive?
skins.login: Happy Lunar New Year. I'm glad I can see you today.
skins.details: Aurora also gave me this incense burner. It's supposed to be good for recovering from fatigue, so shall we give it a try together?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Haah... Commander, I'm sorry... At this rate, this incense... is going to make me fall asleep... Zzzzz
skins.secretaryIdle2: The broth in the hotpot was as red as my clothes... It was a bit scary at first, but the food ended up being really delicious.
skins.secretaryIdle3: The pattern on this fan was embroidered. I learned how to do it from Yat Sen and the others a while back, but my hands were trembling so much I made a mess of things... Ugh, I wonder how everyone does this so well.
skins.secretaryTouch: ...Hm? Already tired? You can lie down here if you'd like.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: ...Um, Commander, I don't think... this is any way to conduct yourself.
